get.description: Gets all connection requests that match the TripLink supplier ID.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached. The default is the beginning of the page.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. The default is 5 and the maximum is 10.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status code representing the state of the connection request. The possible values are Pending, Processing, Connected, Failed, and Retry.

post.description: Creates a connection request on behalf of the specified user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The login ID of the user for whom to create the connection request. The user must have the Web Services Admin role to use this parameter.

get.summary: Get a connection request by ID
get.description: Gets a connection request by ID.

put.summary: Update a connection request by ID
put.description: Updates the specified connection request. Only the fields provided in the supplied object are updated. Missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The connection request object to update.

NextPage.description: If provided, the URI for the next GET call.

FirstName.description: first name of the user for whom the connection request is for.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the connection request.

LastModified.description: The UTC date representing when this connection rerquest was last modified.  Format: YYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS

LastName.description: The last name of the user for whom the connection request is for.

MiddleName.description: The middle name of the user for whom the connection request is for.

RequestToken.description: OAuth2 request token with a limited lifetime (15 minutes) that may be exchanged for an access token.

Status.description:
The status code representing the state of the connection request. The possible values are:

CRSUC - The supplier indicated that the connection was made successfully.
CREU1 - The loyalty number was not found.
CREU2 - The loyalty number doesn't match the name.
CREU3 - Your loyalty account requires attention.
CRPA1 - The request token has expired.
CRPA2 - A network error occurred.
CRRET - Retry connection.

URI.description: URI for the GET call that will return this connection request.
